title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 813.1 - Intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 813.1 - Intent

State Regulations
(a) These rules and
regulations are promulgated pursuant to Municipal Home Rule Law, section 38 to
implement the provisions thereof governing State aid for the development and
revision of city charters. (b) The
program is designed to encourage more effective and efficient governmental
administration and provision of services by city governments through the
development and revision of city charters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
813.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
